title: Handle a Low Appraisal
description: A property's appraisal came in below the purchase price. The agent must advise the client on how to proceed.

tasks.description: Receive the appraisal report and identify the appraised value.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the appraisal is lower than the contract price.

tasks.description: Inform the client (buyer or seller) of the low appraisal and explain the implications for the loan and transaction.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the problem to their client.

tasks.description: Outline the options: buyer brings more cash to closing, seller lowers the price, they meet in the middle, or cancel the contract. Then, begin negotiations with the other party's agent.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides strategic options and initiates negotiations to save the deal.
